parameters: \N<Ryuda Soldier>So you're Segi. I've heard about you.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>As a life-prolonging measure for your husband who is
imprisoned, you are obligated to pay gold every 5 days
during the training period.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>The amount you are required to pay this time is \C[1][1000
MO]\C[0].
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Are you prepared to make the payment this time?\$

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmm... indeed. You have worked hard. It would be good for
you to continue to do so.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>However... should you decide to stop payments out of self-
preservation, we will simply proceed with the necessary
actions.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's this? You don't even have enough money on you to meet
the conditions.

\N<Segi>(...This choice is a very heavy one. It's something that
could affect the fate of Lord Yuia, myself, and even
Riia...)
\N<Segi>(Is this really... really the right thing to do?)
After all, I can't prepare it

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's wrong? Silence won't start anything. Do what you must
do.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>...I see. I understand everything. It seems you were not up
to the task after all.

\N<Segi>W-wait, please! If you could just wait a little longer, I
will surely have the money...!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You have already been given ample time. There will be no
further leniency.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Come now. I said you were not up to the task, but
fortunately, it seems you still have some value to us.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>As a life-prolonging measure for your husband who is
imprisoned, you are obligated to pay gold every 5 days
during the training period.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>The amount you are required to pay this time is \C[1][1000
MO]\C[0].
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Are you prepared to make the payment this time?\$

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmm... indeed. You have worked hard. It would be good for
you to continue to strive in the future.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Of course... should you stop the payments out of self-
preservation, we will simply proceed with the enforcement
methodically.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's this? You also do not have enough money on hand to
meet the conditions.

\N<Segi>(...This choice is a very heavy one. It's something that
could affect the fate of Lord Yuia, myself, and even
Riia...)
\N<Segi>(Is this really... really the right thing to do?)
After all, I can't prepare it

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's wrong? Silence won't start anything. Do what you must
do.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>...I see. I understand everything. It seems you are not up
to the task after all.

\N<Segi>W-wait, please! If you could just wait a little longer, I
will definitely have the money...!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You have already been given ample time. There will be no
further leniency.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Come now. I said you were not up to the task, but
fortunately, it seems you still have some value to us.
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Good work, keep up the effort moving forward.

\N<Man>Isn't that Miss Segi? If you have no business here, it's
better not to go any further.

\N<Man>This place used to be a school for the town's children, but
now it has completely transformed into an educational
facility for Ryuda.
\N<Riia>Ah... Mom, have you seen a kid with a red hat around here?

\N<Segi>A red hat... Oh, the one from earlier. Yes, I saw them. They
seemed to be in a hurry though...? Did something happen with
that child?

\N<Riia>Nothing in particular. I just wanted to have a little chat,
that's all.

\N<Riia>There's nothing in particular. I just wanted to have a
little chat, that's all.

\N<Segi>Segi-san... hello. Do you have any business here today? As
usual, I'm on duty watching over Riia-chan.
